<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

This thick, greasy _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shifting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=302) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ is made from a slimy pseudopod. You don't take the usual –2 circumstance penalty to your attack rolls when using the slime whip to make a lethal attack. The whip's form can be changed just like any weapon with the _shifting_ rune, but it reverts to its original form as soon as it isn't wielded. When in its whip form, you can use the following action.
